actions: Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee on the Judiciary. Ordered to be reported favorably.
Reported by Senator Leahy, Committee on the Judiciary, without printed report.
Placed on Senate Executive Calendar. Calendar No. 40.
name: William H. Orrick, III
nominee: William H. Orrick, III, of the District of Columbia, to be United States District Judge for the Northern District of California
position: United States District Judge for the Northern District of California
